text: ya 'ayuha aladhin amanuu biallah wrswlh, 'inn min 'azwajikum wa'awladikum 'aeda'an lakum ysdwnkm ean sabil allh, wythbtwnkm ean taeth, fkwnu minhum ealaa hdhr, wala ttyewhm, wa'iin ttjawzu ean sayiyaatihim wataearaduu enha, wtstrwha elyhm, fa'iina allah ghafur rhym, yaghfir lakum dhnwbkm; li'anah subhanah eazim alghufran wasie alrhmt
